unsupported.title: Whoops...
unsupported.message: Either the WebAudio API is not supported in this browser or it does not meet the required standards. Sadly, Efflux depends on these standards in order to actually output sound!
unsupported.download: Luckily, you can get a web browser that offers support for free. We recommend {0} for an optimal experience.

error.emptyMeta: Song has no title or author name, take pride in your work!
error.fileLoad: Unknown error occurred while importing file, please try again, if the problems persists, drop us a line.
error.songImport: Could not import song, file was possibly not a valid {extension} file, or made in an incompatible version of Efflux
error.instrumentImport: Could not import instruments, file was possible not a valid {extension} file, or made in an incompatible version of Efflux
error.paramGlide: Could not automate module parameter glide. Define the start and end value for a specific module parameter transition within your pattern, without defining other module parameters in between.

messages.recordingSaved: Recording saved to your download folder

en-US.warningUnload: Are you sure you want to leave this page ? All unsaved changes will be lost.
